about_the_game:
This game received exellence award(Completion category) from nexon.
Nexon's recognized hot topic game! What about try funny trap game? Whoa, don't get mad while playing games! Just Calm down you and princess.

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
Big trouble! Fairyland has gone away.
Deliver the item and calm down the angry princess!
You'll have to navigate through many traps and murderous obstacles
you must deliver the item safely to the princess.
If you don't calm the princess down, something terrible will happen!

Will you be able to calm the princess and save the fairyland?!

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
Game rules
- Move with arrow keys, and jump with the spacebar.
- Find the right item on the map. If you find the right item, your skin will be changed to skin with a bag.
- If you find the right item, go to the portal. portal is located at the end of the map.
- If you enter the portal, you can meet a princess. Win the princess and hand out the item.

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
Skin system
- You can earn princess skins by winning the princesses.

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
Pause the game
- You can pause the game by entering esc key.

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
Controlling music
- You can adjust the sound by entering esc key-> pushing "음향조절" button.

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
Exit the game
- You can exit the game by pushing "X" button at the home scene.

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
In game, there is no mobile button unlike the video.

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
If there are bugs, please contact to e-mail : hanahana6433464@gmail.com

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
You can play this game at google play store.
The difference is 1) you can play Mermaid stage only in steam charge, 2) and no ad in steam.
+) control at PC is easier.

name: 진정해요 공주님!(CalmDownPrincess)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 10
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible Sound Card

  • Memory: 512MB RAM MB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible Sound Card

short_description: The fairy tale land is distorted! Deliver the item to calm the angry princess! Will you be able to calm the princess and save the fairyland?!! #platformer game #action #adventure #a trap game #a trick game
